rules_text:
Blockbuster 4 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap four untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Choose one. If this spell is a blockbuster, you may choose both instead.
• Create two 1/1 red Rogue creature tokens.
• Team Up! deals damage to target creature or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control.
